attributes.action: Re-introduce Dentistry and Chiropody into the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was removed from the NHS after World War 2 to 'release/create' monies to repay America for the war. That 'debt' was finally paid in full last year (2007). That means that we should now be entitled to dentistry and chiropody on the NHS once again!
